title: Toxicity
body:
This is a direct shoutout to Riot, but, could you please be more harsh on punishing toxic players? I get death threats and daily in game chat messages saying I should kill myself since I have no worth to be alive. I do not think that's a very friendly thing to be saying, and it certainly does not help that I'm pretty mental to begin with, so it's almost like an insult to me.

Thank you.

replies.body: Riot would and could do stop Toxicity all together, but you know, they don't want to, and will never want to.
IF Riot wanted to fix the toxicity they could. Seems like they just wanna ban support singed for PR stunt
That Singed support was a champ, made League feel like DOTA 2 for once.
